transcript: I mean, think about people in Kansas. They've got to get like, you know, plane tickets and hotel reservations just to see this. We're just 40 minutes away. It's too good of an opportunity to pass up.

segments.text: I mean, think about people in Kansas. They've got to get like, you know, plane tickets and hotel reservations just to see this.
We're just 40 minutes away. It's too good of an opportunity to pass up.
